text: @HillaryClinton @WHO @WHO has been at the forefront of the #COVID19 crisis, making it worse by providing false Chinese propaganda & down playing the virus until the whole world undeniably had it. Not one dime of US taxpayer money until every senior bureaucrat at WHO is fired! @GOP @TheDemocrats
